EmailTemplate.name: System_Internal_DS Presents_Kaiser_5:30PM.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: You are registered for the DS Presents: Kaiser Hackathon Deep-Dive
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank You for Registering
DS Presents: Kaiser Hackathon Deep-Dive
We're glad you can join us. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We are looking forward to you joining us for our internal DS Presents webinar. This series is exclusive to Pivotal employees and we request that you keep details supplied in this email confidential. An on-demand replay will be posted to the Pivotal Data Science team Socialcast channel post live session.
Event Details:
Date: Wednesday, September 25, 2013
Time: 5:30PM PST/ 8:30AM GMT+08:00
Join the Webex <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?d=661356084&t=a>
Event Number: 661 356 084
Dial In:
- US TOLL FREE: +1-855-749-4750 - US TOLL: +1-415-655-0001 - Global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=107432872&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 661 356 084
Have questions? Contact us <mailto:ajimenez@gopivotal.com>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
Follow Us: Twitter <http://www.twitter.com/gopivotal> | LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/gopivotal> | Facebook <http://www.facebook.com/gopivotal> | Google+ <https://plus.google.com/105320112436428794490>
